name: 变异病毒CleanVirus
description:
Cleanvirus is a free doomsday survival game that supports stand-alone and multi person online.

Players can use weapons with teammates to break through the doomsday survival of mutated viruses.

Players can set their own name, choose stand-alone mode or multi person online mode, or join the specified IP address, use a variety of weapons to resist the attack of zombies, and also kill the boss.

Players can pick up ammunition and blood bags, and help their teammates fight together!
